definition: (law) a person (usually appointed by a court of law) who liquidates assets or preserves them for the benefit of affected parties
details:
noun
- (law) a person (usually appointed by a court of law) who liquidates assets or preserves them for the benefit of affected parties
= synonyms: receiver
- a criminal who commits the unlawful premeditated killing of another human being
= example: a criminal who commits the unlawful premeditated killing of another human being
= synonyms: murderer, manslayer
